name: Spores of Asplenium
description:
Project: Reversed Lens

This image was captured with a technique called "inverted lens" that consists in "transforming" a fixed lens, in this case my 50mm lens in "macro", by disconnecting the lens from the bayonet and turning the lens upside down, without connecting the lens to the camera body.

This technique allows the lens to show only its single focal point, losing all depth of field and the object photographed needs to be very close to have some sharpness.

Brasil.
2021
2800x4200
7,76MB
